long_description: The versatile high back of the MTI Dio PFD is an ideal choice for sit-on-top kayakers. The back foam panel clears all of the highest seat backs. Stretch mesh pockets are roomy enough to fit a smartphone in a dry case and other essential gear. Full-zip front is easy to use for quick on and off. Ripstop nylon shell stands up to frequent use. 6 Points of adjustment ensure you get the proper fit; padded neoprene adjustable shoulders are comfortable. Includes a key keeper and a tethered safety whistle. Reflective trim improves your visibility in low light. Includes a loop for hanging MTI Dio PFD to dry.
short_description: The versatile high back of the MTI Dio PFD is an ideal choice for sit-on-top kayakers. The back foam panel clears all of the highest seat backs.
